item.description:
I can't believe how long it's been since the last Euchre meet-up.  Have no fear, we're back, and fierce.

 

Come play, bring a snack to share, drink of your choice and join us in our home for some fun fun fun!!

Hope to see many of you soon, new members, and  regulars.  Come one come all!!

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: It's sooooo past due for EUCHRE!!! How about it??
